title: Migrating a Service from JBoss ESB to Apache Camel
content: If you have a service running on JBoss ESB and are looking to migrate to a different platform, Apache Camel can be a good choice. Camel is a widely-used, open-source integration framework that allows you to define routing and mediation rules in a variety of domain-specific languages, including a Java-based Fluent API, Spring XML, and ...  The post appeared first on .
